summary: This function retrieves the size of a map.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val map = new TreeMap();%0A%0A    map.put(%22Mercury%22, %22Terrestrial%22);%0A    map.put(%22Mars%22,    %22Terrestrial%22);%0A    map.put(%22Saturn%22,  %22Jovian%22);%0A    map.put(%22Neptune%22, %22Jovian%22);%0A%0A    val size = F::len(map);%0A%0A    F::println(%22Size = %22 .. size);%0A}
